FuncDef: The reset loop-detect eth-loop hop-info command clears all the MAC flapping information or clears the MAC flapping information of a broadcast domain.
CLIs: reset loop-detect eth-loop hop-info [ vlan <vlan-id> | vsi <vsi-name> | bridge-domain <bd-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Clears the MAC flapping information of a specified VLAN.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

Clears the MAC flapping information of a specified VSI.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Clears the MAC flapping information of a specified BD.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16777215.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear the MAC flapping information on a device, run the reset loop-detect eth-loop hop-info command.
